flawed_nl_solution:
Olaf is 12 years + 3 years = <<12+3=15>>15 years old.
Shannen is 15 years old - 2 years = <<15-2=13>>13 years old.
Jack is 5 years + (2 * 13 years) = <<5+(2*13)=13>>13 years old.
The sum of all of their ages is 12 + 15 + 13 + 13 = <<12+15+13+13=53>>53 years old.
#### 53

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 31, not 13. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
